 Transformations performed:

 * Colorize (magick) -> Color: #500e9c | Opacity 43% 
 * Quantize (magick) -> Max Colors in Image: 8 
 * Median (magick) -> Pixels: 30 
 * Modulation (magick) -> Brightness: 105 | Saturation: 136 | Hue: 150
